channel.title: Fearscape | 24/7 VPS | No Lag | 317 Perfected Skilling + PvP | Need Staff |
channel.description:
[COLOR="DarkOrchid"]Hey i just started a new server called Fearscape! Its running on a vps 24/7 Uptime with No lag!. [URL=http://"http://www.fearscape.smfnew.com"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/z8c7rzb562u1h7z/FZ%20CLIENT.rar"]Download Client[/URL] Here are some features :[/COLOR]
[U][CENTER][SIZE="5"][FONT="Tahoma"][COLOR="Cyan"]FEATURES :[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER][/U]
[COLOR="MediumTurquoise"] -Takes 5 Minutes To Start Pking And Get Going -Fully Working PvP Point System -Memory Leaks Fixed Thanks To Jinrake -All skills working, trainable skilling area. -Fully Working Dragon Claw Specials -Fully Working Dark Bow Specials -Fully Working Godsword Specials -Fully Working PvP Timer When Entering Safe Zones -Fully Working 100% Clan Chat With Lootshare -Weapon Stats Powered Correctly, No Weapon Overpowered More Than It Should Be -Toggle Gameframes Between 474, 484, 508, and 525 -All PvP Armour -Working PvP Tasks, Complete Them For Rewards -Click For 1k Barrage Casts, 1k Veng Runes, Bolts And Food -4 Bosses That All Drop Useful Pking Items Such As Claws, DFS, Ranger Boots, Elemental Shield, Robin Hood And More -Donaters Tab, Allows Donaters To Recharge Special, Acces Bank From Anywhere, And Restore Hitpoints. NOTE: It does not allow you to use these in PvP Zones -Server Hosted On A VPS 100% Uptime -Minor And Major Updates To Keep Server Fresh (Were Being Serious This Isnt BS Like Other Servers) -Every Skill Works 100% -Perfect Pking, Added Working Timers -Friendly Staff Who Know What Their Doing, No Noobs That Bought Staff -Hoilday Events, And Server Events -Stable Economy -Working Rushing -Webclient and Desktop Client -Donaters Recieve Items Within 24 Hours -Working Mime Random Event + Sand which Lady [/COLOR]
[COLOR="DarkOrange"]Some Media : [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch_popup?v=OdihxDkCFEA&vq=large]Fearscape Promo | Perfected Pking + Skilling | Best 317 Server |[/url] [url=http://imgur.com/a/eZvka]Fearscape Pictures Album[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dFIUO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gUEmG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e8UUC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PJMBm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kIza7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eNFeH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V4Vl7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d3IGF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G5Eh5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1V70a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SVuWe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q03IV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qJt8r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d4JQA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZMbwe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vr7GO.png[/img] [/COLOR]
